content: KCF 4-22 Cordless jobsite fan Powerful jobsite fan with all-day battery life, rotating head, and hanging hooks for cooling and ventilating working areas (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Jobsite essentials- ### FEATURES:Features Powerful airflow – 650 CFM of airflow help to keep you and your team comfortable and productive during hot workdays All day battery life – pair with Nuron batteries for all day use, even at maximum fan speed (with B22-170 batteries and above) Fully adjustable – bring air circulation wherever you need it with adjustable head and variable speed control Compact and portable – top handle for easy transport and mounting hooks to hang the fan from pipe, rebar, strut, and more On the Nuron battery platform – jobsite cooling without compromise thanks to longer lasting batteries and a range of services to keep you more productive, today and tomorrow Applications Air circulation and ventilation Drying materials (eg. paint) Cooling down working conditions in hot or confined areas ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight: 7.5 lb. Technical Data | Weight | 7.5 lb ### ITEMS- 2421053 - Jobsite Fan KCF 4-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCF 4-22 Jobsite fan
